title: Civil Engineering Internship - GeorgiaTech
description: Four months internship in a Civil Engineering Laboratory under the supervision of Dr. Frost. Development of a porosity computation software to compare numerical simulations of soil. This led to the publication of a paper Comparison between geometrical and dynamic particle packing that can be found here, and which was presented at a Symposium in London
